name: Tregolis
description:
A simple math game inspired by the famous block game.

  • Are falling blocks numbered from 1 to 9. 
  • Your goal is to click on these in order to avoid accumulating one on the other. 
  • For each of them you will have to give the right answer, the sum should always be 10. 
  • If the answer is right the block will disappear.

Notice: 

This is a special (desktop) version of this game made for educational purposes. 

Only in this release you can set the speed of the game.

Full version is available on Google Play Store
